description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of four roof lights (two each) to front roof slope to 74 And 74A Windmill Lane (Joint Application)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): 1754-01 (Existing ground floor plan), 1754-02 (Existing first floor plan), 1754-03 (Existing roof plan), 1754-04 (Existing front elevation), 1754-05 (Existing rear elevation), 1754-06 (Existing side elevation no 74), 1754-07 (Existing side elevation no 74A), 1754-08 (Site plan & location plan), 1754-09 (Specification), 1754-11 (Proposed ground floor plan), 1754-12 (Proposed first floor plan), 1754-13 (Proposed second floor plan; Rev B), 1754-14 (Proposed roof plan; Rev B), 1754-15 (Proposed front elevation), 1754-16 (Proposed rear elevation; Rev B), 1754-17 (Proposed side elevation no 74), 1754-18 (Proposed side elevation no 74A) & Email from Konstanty Zablocki (Soarbond Ltd) to Simone Ward (Ealing Council) dated 19/03/2022,

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounds, in accordance with polices 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy D4of the London Plan (2021).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
| The extensions hereby approved shall be constructed and completed simultaneously on both 74 & 74A Windmill Lane.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounding buildings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021).
